channel.title: Connecting To Real RuneScape?
channel.description: Ok,this really isn't on topic,BUT i was wondering if it will be or has ever been possible to connect to real runescape using a cheat client,or some kind of client where you could do ::pickup (item) or w\e,i do realize if it was possible,jagex would catch on very quick,and most likey find a way to stop it,and ip ban the people trying to do this,i was just curious if you could,does anyone know? :rolleyes:

item.title: Connecting To Real RuneScape?
item.dc:creator: @joshyc6 joshyc6
item.description:
@joshyc6 wrote:

[quote=“johnnytodaro995, post:16, topic:202277”]this is possible and u cant go to jail or get sued dum ass![/quote]thats a lie, first of all you cannot connect to rs on a moparscape client, jagex knows about moparscape dumbass, 2 you would be hacking through there sistems and thyre fore, they could find a way to sue you

Read full topic
